text: hi can somebody teach me on how to setup react on HubSpot and how  it works with HubSpot?

<@U01EDQMSK7C> I’d start here <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate> This should give you a pretty good idea how to use react with your HubSpot modules. Whether you use the boilerplate or extend your own setup you’ll probably want to look into the cli tool as well <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-tools/blob/master/packages/cms-cli/README.md>
